name: Grilled Ham and Cheese With a Twist
author: Megan Nystrom Swanson
summary: Mango chutney adds a delicious twist to a grilled ham and cheese sandwich.
ingredients: 4 slices crusty bread, cut diagonally from a large loaf
directions: Spread chutney onto two slices of bread
Place three slices of ham on top of each piece of bread followed by two slices of Cheddar cheese
Place the remaining slices of bread on top of the cheese, then butter the outsides of the sandwiches on both sides
Cook in a large skillet over medium heat until golden brown, then flip over, and continue cooking until cheese is melted and sandwiches are golden brown on the other side, 2 to 3 minutes per side
